      public Book​(java.lang.String name, int pages)
      Constructs the Book with (int) name and (String) pages and (int) pages read

      pages - -> amount of pages the book has | not < 0 | (int)

      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • Book

      public Book​(java.lang.String name, int pages, int pagesRead)
      Constructs the Book with (int) name and (String) pages and (int) pages read
      Parameters:
      name - -> name of the book | not empty (or just whitespace) or null | (String)
      pages - -> amount of pages the book has | not < 0 | (int)
      pagesRead - -> amount of pages that were read | not < 0 | (int)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
